name: Pillars of Dust
description:
In this retro styled RPG, step into the shoes of Prince Carlton and pauper Gregg as they make their separate ways through a forgotten kingdom. 

Recruit strange companions, find numerous secrets, and complete the quest in the order of your choosing. Can you achieve the coveted 100% completion of this cozy exploration centered RPG?

Features:

- You choose the order! Play through each character's story in the path of your choosing
- Turn based combat... with a twist!
- One-liners, dad jokes, and puns galore
- Explore the countryside, find rare secret items, and level up characters through adventure instead of grinding
- Cozy game world featuring a chicken nugget-based economy and collectible cheese
intro: Retro RPG gameplay meets cozy exploration in the wacky world of Pillars of Dust
